name: RPG Maker MZ Save File
summary: An RMMZSAVE file is a save file created by RPG Maker MZ, a role-playing game (RPG) creation tool. It contains information related to game progress in the JSON format, such as a character's earned money, experience, status points, skills, items, and weapons. RPG Maker MZ games reference RMMZSAVE files to load saved progress, but gamers may also open RMMZSAVE files to modify the saved progress.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

windows.display_name: Referenced by the game created by RPG Maker MZ

macos.display_name: Referenced by the game created by RPG Maker MZ
